code: import axios from"axios";var fetchAllChampions=function fetchAllChampions(){return axios.get("https:/ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/10.4.1/data/en_US/champion.json").then(function(response){return response.data.data;});};var fetchChampionByName=function fetchChampionByName(name){return axios.get("https:/ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/10.4.1/data/en_US/champion/".concat(name,".json"));};var capitalize=function capitalize(v){return v[0].toUpperCase()+v.slice(1);};var championServices={fetchAllChampions:fetchAllChampions,fetchChampionByName:fetchChampionByName,capitalize:capitalize};export default championServices;
